item.title: Getting started with ssrs-2008
item.description: How to declare and set a variable in SSRS # Declare @Text nvarchar(max) Declare @Value int SET @Text = 'Text' SET @Value = 0 Installation or Setup # Detailed instructions on getting ssrs-2008 set up or installed.
